 notify ($event,$msg)

Public Attributes

 _observerId = ''
 This will be assigned by an observable object when attaching.

Detailed Description

Methods to override: notify($event, $msg) This implements the Observer design pattern defining the Observer class. Observer objects can be "attached" to Observable objects to listen for a specific event. Example:

$log = new Logger(); //Logger extends Observer $foo = new Foo(); //Foo extends Observable $foo->attach('moo',$log); //Now $log observers 'moo' events in $foo class of $foo->attach_all($log); // Same but all events are listened
